trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Anniston
There were no other sightings in Anniston on or around August 15th 1957
Summary: RAIL CARS LEAVING FT. MC CLELLAN ALA.CHEM WARFARE CENTER
divs: sighting detailsflat bed rail car w\ tarp covering all except one where the tarp came loose. the vessels i could see where saucer shaped w\ 2 seats which today would be called high back and had what appeared to be a glass doom.three tri-pods\ ports coming out of the sides and bottom of the craft. i am 59 years old and a retireed military veteran. i have never said anything to anyone about this occourance since it happened in the 1950's. my friend larry clark i think still lives in anniston , alabama an he was present when this happened. i have not spoke to him in almost 45 years. i will take a polygraph on what i am listing here. thak you, dj jernigan
